interactions.effect: Increased risk of bleeding due to combined anticoagulant effects
interactions.recommendation: Avoid combination unless specifically directed by healthcare provider

interactions.effect: Increased risk of gastrointestinal bleeding and reduced anticoagulant effectiveness
interactions.recommendation: Avoid combination; use acetaminophen instead for pain relief

interactions.effect: May increase warfarin levels and bleeding risk
interactions.recommendation: More frequent INR monitoring needed when starting or stopping antibiotic

interactions.effect: Significantly increases warfarin effects and bleeding risk
interactions.recommendation: Warfarin dose reduction and frequent INR monitoring required

food_interactions.effect: May decrease warfarin effectiveness due to vitamin K content
food_interactions.recommendation: Maintain consistent intake rather than suddenly changing consumption

food_interactions.effect: May increase warfarin effect and bleeding risk
food_interactions.recommendation: Avoid large consumption of cranberry juice or supplements

interactions.effect: Increased risk of hyperkalemia (high potassium levels)
interactions.recommendation: Monitor potassium levels regularly if combination necessary

interactions.effect: Increased risk of hyperkalemia (high potassium levels)
interactions.recommendation: Regular monitoring of potassium levels and kidney function

interactions.effect: May reduce blood pressure lowering effects and increase kidney damage risk
interactions.recommendation: Use alternative pain relievers when possible; monitor blood pressure

interactions.effect: May increase lithium levels and toxicity
interactions.recommendation: Monitor lithium levels when starting or adjusting lisinopril

food_interactions.effect: Increased risk of hyperkalemia when consumed in large amounts
food_interactions.recommendation: Be cautious with salt substitutes and foods high in potassium

interactions.effect: Increases statin concentration and risk of side effects including muscle damage
interactions.recommendation: Avoid grapefruit juice while taking simvastatin

interactions.effect: Significantly increases statin levels, raising risk of muscle damage (rhabdomyolysis)
interactions.recommendation: Temporarily discontinue simvastatin during clarithromycin treatment

interactions.effect: Increases risk of myopathy and rhabdomyolysis at high simvastatin doses
interactions.recommendation: Limit simvastatin dose to 20mg daily when taken with amlodipine

interactions.effect: Increases simvastatin levels and risk of muscle toxicity
interactions.recommendation: Limit simvastatin dose to 10mg daily with diltiazem

food_interactions.effect: Increases drug concentration by interfering with metabolism

interactions.effect: Increased risk of lactic acidosis, particularly in patients with kidney impairment
interactions.recommendation: Typically discontinued 48 hours before and after imaging with contrast

interactions.effect: Increases risk of lactic acidosis and hypoglycemia
interactions.recommendation: Limit alcohol consumption while taking metformin

interactions.effect: May increase metformin levels by reducing elimination
interactions.recommendation: Monitor blood glucose more closely when starting cimetidine

interactions.effect: Reduced levothyroxine absorption
interactions.recommendation: Take levothyroxine at least 4 hours before or after calcium supplements

interactions.effect: Reduced levothyroxine absorption
interactions.recommendation: Take levothyroxine at least 4 hours before or after iron supplements

interactions.effect: May decrease absorption of levothyroxine
interactions.recommendation: Monitor thyroid function when starting or stopping PPI therapy

interactions.effect: Significantly reduces levothyroxine absorption
interactions.recommendation: Take levothyroxine at least 4 hours before or after cholestyramine

food_interactions.recommendation: Take levothyroxine on empty stomach, 30-60 minutes before food
Take levothyroxine at least 30-60 minutes before drinking coffee

interactions.effect: May reduce contraceptive effectiveness
interactions.recommendation: Use additional contraceptive method during antibiotic treatment

interactions.effect: Increased risk of skin rash
interactions.recommendation: Monitor for rash development, especially during first few days

interactions.effect: May decrease methotrexate elimination, increasing toxicity risk
interactions.recommendation: Monitor for methotrexate side effects when using concurrently

interactions.effect: Increases amoxicillin levels by reducing elimination
interactions.recommendation: This combination is sometimes used intentionally to increase amoxicillin effectiveness

interactions.effect: May decrease cardioprotective effects of aspirin
interactions.recommendation: Take aspirin at least 30 minutes before or 8 hours after ibuprofen

interactions.effect: May reduce blood pressure lowering effects
interactions.recommendation: Monitor blood pressure if both medications are needed

interactions.effect: Increased bleeding risk
interactions.recommendation: Avoid combination unless specifically directed by healthcare provider

interactions.effect: May increase lithium levels and toxicity
interactions.recommendation: Monitor lithium levels when starting, stopping, or changing ibuprofen dose

interactions.effect: Increased risk of serotonin syndrome
interactions.recommendation: Avoid combination or use with extreme caution

interactions.effect: Life-threatening serotonin syndrome
interactions.recommendation: Do not use within 14 days of each other

interactions.effect: Increased bleeding risk
interactions.recommendation: Monitor INR more frequently

interactions.effect: Increased risk of serotonin syndrome
interactions.recommendation: Use combination with caution and monitor for serotonin syndrome symptoms

interactions.effect: May reduce antiplatelet effectiveness of clopidogrel
interactions.recommendation: Consider alternative acid reducer like pantoprazole if clopidogrel needed

interactions.effect: May increase methotrexate levels and toxicity
interactions.recommendation: Monitor for methotrexate side effects

interactions.effect: May increase diazepam levels
interactions.recommendation: Monitor for increased sedation

interactions.effect: May increase digoxin absorption and levels
interactions.recommendation: Monitor digoxin levels when starting or stopping omeprazole

interactions.effect: Increased risk of gastrointestinal ulceration and bleeding
interactions.recommendation: Consider gastroprotective medication if combination necessary

interactions.effect: Reduced vaccine effectiveness and potential risk from live virus
interactions.recommendation: Avoid live vaccines while on significant doses of prednisone

interactions.effect: May increase blood glucose levels, reducing effectiveness of diabetes medications
interactions.recommendation: Monitor blood glucose more closely when starting or stopping prednisone

interactions.effect: May increase prednisone levels and side effects
interactions.recommendation: Consider prednisone dose reduction when used with ketoconazole

interactions.effect: Increases statin concentration and risk of side effects
interactions.recommendation: Limit or avoid grapefruit juice while taking atorvastatin

interactions.effect: Increases atorvastatin levels and risk of muscle damage
interactions.recommendation: Consider atorvastatin dose reduction during clarithromycin treatment

interactions.effect: Significantly increases atorvastatin levels and risk of rhabdomyolysis
interactions.recommendation: Use lower atorvastatin doses (10mg maximum) with cyclosporine

food_interactions.effect: Increases drug concentration by interfering with metabolism
food_interactions.recommendation: Limit or avoid grapefruit and grapefruit juice

interactions.effect: May increase metoprolol levels and side effects
interactions.recommendation: Monitor heart rate and blood pressure when using together

interactions.effect: May increase metoprolol levels
interactions.recommendation: Be aware of potential for increased metoprolol effects

interactions.effect: May cause excessive heart rate slowing and conduction problems
interactions.recommendation: Monitor cardiac function when using together

interactions.effect: Significantly increases alprazolam levels and sedative effects
interactions.recommendation: Avoid combination if possible, or reduce alprazolam dose significantly

interactions.effect: Increases alprazolam levels and sedative effects
interactions.recommendation: Consider alprazolam dose reduction when used with erythromycin

interactions.effect: Dangerous increase in sedation and respiratory depression
interactions.recommendation: Avoid alcohol completely while taking alprazolam

food_interactions.effect: May increase alprazolam levels and side effects
food_interactions.recommendation: Avoid grapefruit juice while taking alprazolam

interactions.effect: Can cause serotonin syndrome, a potentially life-threatening condition
interactions.recommendation: Do not use within 14 days of each other

interactions.effect: Increased bleeding risk
interactions.recommendation: Monitor INR more frequently

interactions.effect: Increased bleeding risk
interactions.recommendation: Use with caution; monitor for signs of bleeding

interactions.effect: May increase INR and bleeding risk
interactions.recommendation: Monitor INR when starting or stopping azithromycin

interactions.effect: May increase digoxin levels, potentially causing toxicity
interactions.recommendation: Monitor digoxin levels when using together

interactions.effect: Increases azithromycin exposure
interactions.recommendation: Monitor for increased azithromycin side effects

interactions.effect: May increase lithium levels and toxicity
interactions.recommendation: Monitor lithium levels when starting, stopping, or changing diuretic dose

interactions.effect: May reduce diuretic effectiveness and worsen kidney function
interactions.recommendation: Monitor blood pressure and kidney function

interactions.effect: Thiazide-induced hypokalemia may increase digoxin toxicity
interactions.recommendation: Monitor potassium and digoxin levels

interactions.effect: Increased risk of hyperkalemia
interactions.recommendation: Monitor potassium levels when using together

interactions.effect: May reduce blood pressure lowering effects and increase kidney damage risk
interactions.recommendation: Monitor blood pressure and kidney function

interactions.effect: May increase lithium levels and toxicity
interactions.recommendation: Monitor lithium levels when starting or stopping losartan

interactions.effect: May reduce effectiveness of both medications
interactions.recommendation: Cardioselective beta blockers preferred if combination necessary

interactions.effect: Increased risk of arrhythmias due to potassium effects
interactions.recommendation: Monitor potassium levels and cardiac function

interactions.effect: May potentiate cardiovascular effects of albuterol
interactions.recommendation: Use with caution; monitor blood pressure and heart rate

interactions.effect: Increased risk of sedation and respiratory depression
interactions.recommendation: Use lower doses of both medications when combined

interactions.effect: Reduces gabapentin absorption
interactions.recommendation: Separate doses by at least 2 hours

interactions.effect: Increased CNS depression
interactions.recommendation: Avoid alcohol or use in minimal amounts

interactions.effect: May increase lithium levels and toxicity
interactions.recommendation: Monitor lithium levels when starting, stopping, or changing diuretic dose

interactions.effect: May reduce diuretic effectiveness and worsen kidney function
interactions.recommendation: Monitor blood pressure and kidney function

interactions.effect: Diuretic-induced electrolyte imbalances may increase digoxin toxicity
interactions.recommendation: Monitor electrolytes and digoxin levels
